content: what kind of car do you drive

Hey! So, I don't actually own a car yet since I'm still in college and my main mode of transportation is walking or taking the bus. But, if I had to choose, I'd probably go for something like a Tesla Model 3 - it's just so cool how electric cars are changing the game when it comes to sustainability and tech integration! Plus, I've always been fascinated by AI-powered autonomous driving features. What about you, do you have a favorite car model or one that you think is making waves in the industry?
